#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#include<stdio.h>
#define gc getchar_unlocked
using namespace std;
long long int readint() {
  char c = gc();
  while(c<'0' || c>'9') c = gc();
  long long int ret = 0;
  while(c>='0' && c<='9') {
    ret = 10 * ret + c - 48;
    c = gc();
  }
  return ret;
}

return 0;
